snippet: The former Italian prime minister was found guilty of bribing a senator to undermine the government of his longtime opponent, Romano Prodi.
abstract: Naples court finds former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi guilty of corruption, sentencing him to three years and bans him from public office.
lead_paragraph: The former Italian prime minister was found guilty of bribing a senator to undermine the government of his longtime opponent, Romano Prodi.

headline.main: Berlusconi Is Convicted in Graft Case
headline.print_headline: Berlusconi Is Convicted in Graft Case
